name: The Honorable Joan ORIE MELVIN, Appellant v. The Honorable Robin L. WIESSMANN, State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the Administrative Office of Pennsylvania Courts, Appellees

parties: The Honorable Joan ORIE MELVIN, Appellant v. The Honorable Robin L. WIESSMANN, State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the Administrative Office of Pennsylvania Courts, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 232
The Honorable Joan ORIE MELVIN, Appellant v. The Honorable Robin L. WIESSMANN, State Treasurer of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and the Administrative Office of Pennsylvania Courts, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 25, 2008.
. Substituted as a party pursuant to Pa. R.A.P. 502(c).
